attributes.action: Put First aid into the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
2015 - 140,000 died in situations where their lives could’ve been saved 
Equivalent to the number of deaths caused by Cancer
Need to raise awareness to public and schools
�
attributes.background:
People’s voices will be brought together to achieve this outcome.
By doing this, young people will know all about first aid.
Your signature WILL help young people with vital skills.
�
